General.Name: Codebase Ventures Inc
General.Description: Cypher Metaverse Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in bitcoin mining business. It is involved in identifying and investing in emerging technology sectors, including cryptocurrencies, non-fungible tokens (NFTs), biotechnology, cannabis, and CBD wellness sectors. The company was formerly known as Codebase Ventures Inc. and changed its name to Cypher Metaverse Inc. in March 15, 2022. Cypher Metaverse Inc. was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 355 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2G8
